resources.string: Do Addition Based on Normal Mode Method. After that, Determine Whether the Result is Odd or Even
You\'ll Have 5 Seconds to Answer Each Questions, the Timer will Reset Each Time if You Hit a Correct Answer
Convert the Alphabets Into the Corresponding Numbers. Example: 20EB = 2052, Then Do Additions Based on Normal Mode Methods
This game will Consist of 3 Different Modes: Normal, Odd/Even, and AlphaNum Which will be Asked Randomly
Do Addition to Itself First Before Sum to Other Digit. Example: 2244 = 4488, Then Do Additions Based on Normal Mode Methods
1. New Feature Answer Streaks! \n2. Leaderboard Bug Fixed \n3. UI Improvements

Let Say Question is:

345

12

1 + 2
